title: Rebooting for the Sequel
goal: Set up the long-term quest to fix (or further break) the world.
stakes_shift: Artie transitions from a player trying to survive to a virus-entity leading a resistance against the System.

bridge.to_next: Artie begins the quest for the Source Code in Book 2.

sections.title: The New Normal
sections.intent: Show Artie adapting to life as a 'virus' entity within the broken game world.

scenes.summary: Artie learns how to eat 'Data-Packets' instead of food to maintain his existence.
scenes.outcome: Artie adapts to his new existence.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Fizz explains that the only way to save the world is to reach the 'Server Room' at the world's center.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie tests his 'NaN' HP by jumping off a cliff, only to clip through the floor and end up back at the top.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes his new immortality is just as annoying as his previous fragility.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie realizes his new immortality is just as annoying as his previous fragility.

sections.title: The Resistance
sections.intent: Introduce the Beta-Tester faction and set up the series-long pursuit of the Admin.

scenes.summary: Silas and a group of 'Beta-Testers' find Artie in the Null-Zone and reveals they've been waiting for a glitch like him.
scenes.outcome: Artie finds allies who know the world's secrets.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The Beta-Testers reveal that Vane has been 'upgraded' by the System to be a 'Patch-Hunter' to track Artie.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry continues with higher stakes.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie receives a legendary quest to 'Delete the Admin,' locking in the series arc.
scenes.outcome: Artie accepts the legendary quest to 'Delete the Admin'.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie accepts the legendary quest to 'Delete the Admin'.

sections.title: The First Step
sections.intent: Conclude the book with a transition toward the next adventure and a comedic final beat.

scenes.summary: Artie and his new allies prepare to leave the Null-Zone and head to the 'Glitch-Woods'.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, hoping for better drop rates in the next zone.
scenes.outcome: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, hoping for better drop rates.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie steps into a portal to the Glitch-Woods, hoping for better drop rates.
